title: Data on bus lane penalties and parking fines

content:
Hello,
I hereby wish to request a set of data I believe your council holds. I am after the following:
- The number of bus lane penalty charge notices (PCN) issued in the last 12 months
- The total income generated from bus lane penalty charge notices (PCN) issued in the last 12 months
I also require the following:
- The total number of penalty charge notices (PCNs) issued in the last 12 months.
- The specific location within your local authority where the most penalty charge notices (PCN) were issued in the last 12 months
- The total income generated from the penalty charge notices (PCN) issued in the last 12 months
Many thanks in advance.
Best,
Kaizen

Dear Kaizen,
Thank you for your request for information relating to bus lane penalties
and parking fines which we received on 17/02/2023.
Unfortunately, Sheffield City Council cannot process your requests because
you have not given us your full name.  Section 8 of the Freedom of
Information Act states that you must give us your full name for a request
to be valid.
Could you please let us know your full name to enable us to process your
request.
For further guidance please see the Information Commissioners Office
Guidance “Recognising a request made under the Freedom of Information Act”
– in particular the section entitled “Name of the applicant”, on the link
below:
[1]
https://ico.org.uk/media/for-organisatio...
In the meantime, please do not hesitate to contact us at the email address
below if you have any queries.
Kind Regards,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
Email: [2][Sheffield City Council request email]
P Please don't print this e-mail unless you really need to
From: Kaizen <[FOI #950651 email]>
Sent: 17 February 2023 11:06
To: FOI <[Sheffield City Council request email]>
Subject: Freedom of Information request - Data on bus lane penalties and
parking fines
Hello,
I hereby wish to request a set of data I believe your council holds. I am
after the following:
- The number of bus lane penalty charge notices (PCN) issued in the last
12 months
- The total income generated from bus lane penalty charge notices (PCN)
issued in the last 12 months
I also require the following:
- The total number of penalty charge notices (PCNs) issued in the last 12
months.
- The specific location within your local authority where the most penalty
charge notices (PCN) were issued in the last 12 months
- The total income generated from the penalty charge notices (PCN) issued
in the last 12 months
Many thanks in advance.
Best,
Kaizen
-------------------------------------------------------------------
Please use this email address for all replies to this request:
[3][FOI #950651 email]
Is [4][Sheffield City Council request email] the wrong address for Freedom of Information
requests to Sheffield City Council? If so, please contact us using this
form:
[5]
https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlo...
Disclaimer: This message and any reply that you make will be published on
the internet. Our privacy and copyright policies:
[6]
https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlo...
For more detailed guidance on safely disclosing information, read the
latest advice from the ICO:
[7]
https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlo...
[8]
https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlo...
Please note that in some cases publication of requests and responses will
be delayed.
If you find this service useful as an FOI officer, please ask your web
manager to link to us from your organisation's FOI page.
